name: opentui-dev
description: Build production-quality terminal UIs with @opentui/core - comprehensive patterns from Maximus Loop TUI POC including dual API patterns, component factories, animations, scrolling, and theme systems
tagline: Production-ready OpenTUI patterns for terminal UI development
warnings: OpenTUI is pre-1.0 - expect breaking changes between versions
Bun runtime required - will not work with Node.js
Requires interactive terminal (TTY) - won't work in CI/CD without PTY

usage.when: Building terminal user interfaces with @opentui/core, creating TUI screens, implementing terminal animations, working with declarative/imperative rendering patterns, or developing command-line applications with rich UIs
examples: Create an OpenTUI screen with scrolling list
Build animated progress indicator with timeline
Implement theme switching in terminal UI
Add keyboard navigation to TUI component
Build a live data stream viewer with pool-based rendering
